title: structFindKey
name: structFindKey
description:
Searches recursively through a substructure of nested arrays,
        structures, and other elements, for structures whose values
        match the search key in the value parameter.

arguments.name: Top
arguments.description: object from which to start search. This parameter requires an object, not a name of an object.

arguments.name: Scope
arguments.description:
- one (default): returns one matching key.
- all: returns all matching keys
